tweet: "We're told your size comes from your grandfather Isaac... who sadly passed away last month at the age of 84." Oake really just said that.
Seriously. If you're not watching this, Oake said that he was surprised Penner's "struggles" last year didn't make him see a psychiatrist.
Dustin Penner's interview with Scott Oake on After Hours is going to make me smother myself with a pillow. Scott Oake is. killing. me.
